text: Europe Airpost is a cargo airline based in Paris, France. They fly mail and cargo around as needed. Their main base of operations is at Paris-Charles de Gaulle Airport but they also have a base in Tangier Airport in Morocco. Most of their flights are within Europe but they also fly to the north of Africa. == Fleet == *16x Boeing 737-300 *2x Boeing 737-700 Category:Airlines of France
title: Europe Airpost
